text: Eadweard cing gret ealle mine biscopas & eorlas & þegnas on ælcere scire <þer> land ligce in to Ealdan Mynstre.

& ic cyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe geunnen ælfwine biscop þæs byscoprices eall swa full & swa forð swa Cnud cing hit him firmest geuðe binnan porte & butan, on lande & on strande, on wudan & on feldan & on læse.

& ic geann Criste & Sancte Petre & Sancte Paule in to þan halgan stede & him þæt hig beon heora sace wurðe & socne, binnan porte & butan, tolles wurðe & teames, forstealles & infangenes þeofes, hamsocne & mundbrices & flymene fyrmðe on freolse & butan & ælces wites læssan & maran Gode to lofe for minre sawle & for ealra cyninga þe ætforan me wæron & æfter me cumað.
& gif hwa þis awendan wylle sy he fordemed mid Iudan Scariothe butan he ær his forðsiðe hit gebete.
